items.sentence: How long did it take you to learn French this well?
How much longer do you think this is going to last?
They\'re still waiting for us to make up our minds.
I\'m still not used to working so many hours a day.
I\'ve been wanting to learn French for a long time.
I\'ve finally gotten used to living here in Boston.
Tom told Mary not to worry about what might happen.
Tom was bitten by a snake while he was on vacation.
Tom didn\'t really want to deal with the situation.
I debated for hours with my friends on the subject.
What activity do you spend most of your time doing?
I wonder whether Tom is free this afternoon or not.
Tom couldn\'t remember where he put his sunglasses.
Please wait for me at the entrance of the building.
Tom said some things about Mary that weren\'t true.
I wasn\'t aware that I wasn\'t supposed to do that.
Tom was afraid that no one would come to his party.
How did you know Tom was going to go fishing today?
How did you know that Tom was the one who did that?
I\'m not sure that Tom would let anybody help Mary.
